title: New airborne research facility observes sensitivity of cumulus cloud microphysical properties to aerosol regime over the Great Barrier Reef

Our work on aerosol-cloud-radiation interactions became hamstrung by the lack of a suitable aerosol and cloud microphysics equipped aircraft platform in Australia. The use of unmanned aerial vehicles and small...
